titles.title: Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act
Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act
To create jobs and promote fair trade by increasing duties on certain foreign goods imported into the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act - Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to increase the duty on polyurethane sponges.
Prescribes requirements for the duty treatment of steel wool cleaning pads.
